game.name: Zootropolis Burger Cooking
game.description:
Zootropolis Burger Cooking is an awesome online recreational activity meant for both girls and boys from all age groups. In this free online cooking game, you will have to decorate a delicious burger with the help of Judy and Nick. Do all the activities with an open mind since today is a rainy day at Zootropolis. These two handsome heroes Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde from the serious Zootpia will be highly thankful to you if the final results are up to the mark. Just pay attention to the complete details in order to achieve the goal successfully. 

Use the mouse to get the job done perfectly to make your burger really delicious. You will find our popular heroes in the kitchen area to support you. Follow their suggestions to create a nice hamburger for clients. Nick Wilde is a fox seen in a very popular Hollywood movie in which she is encouraged to prepare a team with the help of a well-known police officer named Judy Hopps to sort out a case. These famous characters want to prepare a delicious hamburger in their kitchen, but do not have a proper idea how to go for it. 

Your support in this brand new cooking game for girls will help them complete their goal and bring a huge smile on their faces. Although the task is pretty difficult, just going through the complete instructions could help make your way. These both characters rely on your talent, so please do not do anything that could make them feel low. Hope you will give your best to prepare the best hamburger ever in this cool html5 game for girls and boys!
